__e: So, it seems we have a case of industrial espionage.
You're here to find out why I said it was industrial espionage when you know it wasn't.
You know, though, I'm beginning to think that Vivian's death had nothing to do with corporate espionage.
Just saying, on the level you guys play at, espionage happens all the time, which is why I know you'll do anything to protect your secrets.
As my mother always said, when they were in East Berlin Sat... spying is easy, parents are is difficult.
You've had years to bust this spy ring. You didn't, why?
